title: Truth Be Told, Comedy Roulette, MTH, Coming to America 2 and more.
itunes:title: Truth Be Told, Comedy Roulette, MTH, Coming to America 2 and more.
description:
Happy Friday!  Steve and Bitterman sing songs from The Commodores.  We have back in the day Steve story just for you.  Junior is here to give you Truth Be Told.  Are school Cafeteria's charging way too much or nah?  The crew point out certain situations that tell when to shut up.  Fool #2 murders another one.  We have certain statements between couples that most likely will lead to full blown arguments.  Coming to America 2 is coming to theaters in 2020.  Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO speaks about the importance of surrounding yourself with positive people and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
